meanings.definition: Not functioning or in working order.
meanings.sent3: The nonoperational alarm clock made me oversleep.
meanings.sent4: Her nonoperational car left her stranded on the highway.
meanings.sent5: The nonoperational elevator caused delays for the passengers.

meanings.definition: Not capable of being used or operated.
meanings.sent3: The nonoperational vending machine ate my money without giving snacks.
meanings.sent4: His nonoperational phone left him disconnected from the world.
meanings.sent5: The nonoperational remote control made changing channels impossible.
